type: MECHANICAL MAINTENANCE SERVICES FOR RCMP YORKTON RURAL DETACHMENT
short_summary: RCMP seeks bids for mechanical maintenance services for Yorkton Rural Detachment.
description: RCMP requires mechanical maintenance services for the Royal Canadian Mounted Police Yorkton Rural Detachment, in Yorkton, SK. The contract period will be for twenty-four months from the date of contract with an irrevocable option to extend it for up to two additional twelve month periods.
full_summary:
# RFQ: Mechanical Maintenance Services for RCMP Yorkton Rural Detachment

## Request for Proposal Overview

The Royal Canadian Mounted Police (RCMP) is soliciting proposals for Mechanical Maintenance Services for the RCMP Yorkton Rural Detachment in Yorkton, Saskatchewan.

### Summary of Service Requirements

The successful supplier will provide mechanical maintenance services for a period of twenty-four months with an option to extend the contract for up to two additional twelve-month periods. Security requirements are specified in the Request for Proposal (RFP).

### Evaluation Criteria

Tenders will be evaluated based on a combination of technical merit and price.

### Site Visit

A site visit is offered, and further information can be found in the RFP.

### Notice to Suppliers

Canada retains the right to negotiate with any supplier on any procurement, and documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada.

### Integrity Provisions

The RCMP has adopted the Integrity Regime administered by Public Services and Procurement Canada. As a result, the integrity provisions are being applied in RCMP contracting activities as outlined in this solicitation.

### Tenders Submissions

Tenders must be submitted according to the instructions provided in page one of the RFP. The successful supplier will be selected based on a combination of technical merit and price.

### Important Documents

The following documents can be downloaded from the Government Electronic Tendering Service (GETS) website:

- RFQ No. M5000-21-02837/A
- Attachment 1 - Mechanical Maintenance Services for RCMP Yorkton Rural Detachment (English)
- Attachment 2 - Amendment 1 (English)
- Attachment 3 - Annex C - SRCL 2020-111628 (English)
- Attachment 4 - Amendment 2 (English)
- Attachment 5 - Annex E - List of Names for Integrity Verification Form (English)

## Contact Information

For Questions and Concerns:

* Shawn Balaski, RCMP Yorkton Rural Detachment
* shawn.m.balaski@rcmp-grc.gc.ca
* Phone: (780) 670-8592

## Compliant Document and Attachments

The subject RFQ has been optimized for Canadian federal contracting authority. Please download the compliant documents above from CanadaBUs. Targeting compliance is imperative to foresee peace of mind as critical for participation.
